root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Références

URL :

http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population

https://www.unfpa.org/data

Références :

World Fertility Data 2017 (POP/DB/Fert/Rev2017), publication de l'Organisation des Nations unies, accessible au public à l'adresse http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/dataset/fertility/wfd2017.shtml.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, édition DVD Publication de l'Organisation des Nations Unies, accessible sur http://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, Methodology of the United Nations Population Estimates and Projections, document de travail n° ESA/P/WP.250, publication des Nations Unies, disponible à l'adresse suivante : https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Publications/Files/WPP2017_Methodology.pdf.

Handbook on Indicators for Monitoring the Millennium Development Goals, Organisation des Nations unies, accessible à l'adresse http://mdgs.un.org/unsd/mi/wiki/MainPage.ashx

Handbook on the Collection of Fertility and Mortality Data Publication de l'Organisation des Nations unies, numéro de vente F.03.XVII.11, disponible sur le site http://unstats.un.org/unsd/publication/SeriesF/SeriesF_92E.pdf.

Manual X: Indirect Techniques for Demographic Estimation, Publication de l'Organisation des Nations Unies, No. de vente E.83.XIII.2, disponible sur https://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/pdf/mortality/Manual_X.pdf.

Indicator and Monitoring Framework for the Global Strategy for Women’s, Children’s and Adolescents’ Health (2016-2030), disponible à l'adresse http://www.everywomaneverychild.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/EWEC_INDICATOR_MONITORING_FRAMEWORK_2016-1.pdf.

References

URL:

http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population

https://www.unfpa.org/data

References:

World Fertility Data 2017 (POP/DB/Fert/Rev2017), United Nations Publication, publicly accessible at http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/dataset/fertility/wfd2017.shtml.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, DVD Edition United Nations Publication, accessible at http://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp.

World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, Methodology of the United Nations Population Estimates and Projections, Working Paper No. ESA/P/WP.250, United Nations Publication, available at https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Publications/Files/WPP2017_Methodology.pdf.

Handbook on Indicators for Monitoring the Millennium Development Goals, United Nations, accessible at http://mdgs.un.org/unsd/mi/wiki/MainPage.ashx

Handbook on the Collection of Fertility and Mortality Data, United Nations Publication, Sales No. E.03.XVII.11, available at http://unstats.un.org/unsd/publication/SeriesF/SeriesF_92E.pdf.

Manual X: Indirect Techniques for Demographic Estimation, United Nations Publication, Sales No. E.83.XIII.2, available at http://www.un.org/esa/population/publications/Manual_X/Manual_X.htm.

Indicator and Monitoring Framework for the Global Strategy for Women’s, Children’s and Adolescents’ Health (2016-2030), available at: http://www.everywomaneverychild.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/EWEC_INDICATOR_MONITORING_FRAMEWORK_2016-1.pdf.
